Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Southbound  Reroute near North Blvd/Forest Ave
ShortDescription: Southbound 90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Washington, Wisconsin, Randolph and Harlem : due to, street blockage near North Blvd/Forest Ave

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Washington, Wisconsin, Randolph and Harlem : due to, street blockage near North Blvd/Forest Ave

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball/Homan Temporary Reroute near Lawndale/26th
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball/Homan NB via Central Park, Douglas, Homan & normal rte: SB via Central Park, 31st, Lawndale & Central Park, due to blockage nr Lawndale/26th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#82 Kimball/Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Lawndale/26th.

Northbound buses will continue on Central Park, Douglas Homan, then resume their normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via Central Park, 31st, Lawndale, Central Park, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
